member.name: T:AutoWire.DI.Analyzers.CodeAnalysis.AutoInjectAnalyzer
member.summary: Analyzes the usage of the AutoInjectAttribute on class declarations.

member.name: F:AutoWire.DI.Analyzers.CodeAnalysis.AutoInjectAnalyzer.Rule

member.name: M:AutoWire.DI.Analyzers.CodeAnalysis.AutoInjectAnalyzer.AnalyzeNode(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.SyntaxNodeAnalysisContext)
